I play many instruments.
I give lessons on string instruments.
I like to travel.
My favorite music genre is classical.
I like to cook with food i grow in my garden.

participant_2.background:
My name is frank.
I am the general manager of the local grocery store.
My hobbies include reading and cycling.
I hope to someday compete professionally or atleast qualify for an event.
I spend the weekends travelling up to canada to relax and enjoy the view.

content.text: Hi, my name is participant_1. What's your name?
Hi, my name is Frank. It's nice to meet you.
It's nice to meet you too, Frank. What do you do for a living?
I'm the general manager of the local grocery store.
Oh, that sounds like a busy job.
It can be, but I like it.
What do you like about your job?
I like the people I work with, and I like helping people find what they need.
That's great. What are your hobbies?
I like to read, cycle, and travel.
Oh, that's cool. I like reading too. What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read all kinds of books, but I'm especially interested in history and nonfiction.
I like history too. I've been reading a lot about the Roman Empire lately.
Oh, that's really cool. I've always been fascinated by ancient history.
Me too. I think it's so interesting to learn about how people lived in the past.
Me too. It's amazing to think about how different the world was just a few hundred years ago.
I know, right? I'm so glad we live in the present day.
Me too. It's a great time to be alive.
I know, right? I'm excited to see what the future holds.
Me too. I think it's going to be a bright one.
